snippet: A judge is not issuing an arrest warrant for Gov. Rick Perry, who was indicted last week on two felony counts of abuse of power, a court official said.
abstract: Judge Bert Richardson will not issue arrest warrant for Texas Gov Rick Perry, who has been indicted on two felony counts of abuse of power; Perry will instead receive a summons, which has not been issued yet.
lead_paragraph: A judge is not issuing an arrest warrant for Gov. Rick Perry, who was indicted last week on two felony counts of abuse of power, a court official said.

headline.main: Texas: Perry Will Face Summons, Not an Arrest Warrant
headline.print_headline: Texas: Perry Will Face a Summons, Not an Arrest Warrant, Judge Decides
